text:
Too bad.  Waluigi time!

Main reason I loved Shade Man's theme is because it wasn't... well, "cutesy" like most of the other stage themes of 7.  Don't get me wrong, I love 7's music (especially Freeze and Slash Man) but the sound chip made everything sound so... saccharine.
